name: vicegerency
content:

the position or office of a vicegerent (= a person who represents God on earth or who represents a ruler or other person with authority), or the area that they rule over: In the Qur'an it says that since humans were given the vicegerency of God on Earth, we must be caretakers of the environment. The ideal of popular vicegerency involves responsibility for governance being delegated by God to the entire community of the faithful.
